author: woonsan
msg: APA-17: Adding the last visited page feature.
I chose to use client-side script to invoke resource url to set a portlet session attribute for storing the last visited page.
If I choose a server-side solution with reverse proxy component, then it will not work with other proxy server solutions.

author: ashish
msg: Instead of specifying each field in service definition - its better to use auto-attribute tag if we wanted to pass all the fields to service implementation.
Thanks Awdesh & Sumit for the patch.

author: ashish
msg: Display date that we prefer in OFBiz instead of showing eBay date format.
